attributes.action: Make Micheal Gove think before he speaks
attributes.additional_details:
NUT have announced another strike, exam boards and Department of Education officials are walking around with haunted looks on their faces as they don't know what stupid idea is coming next.

Teachers are leaving the profession and greater and great numbers, support staff are finding their jobs under threat ... all because the Secretary of State for education can't help vocalising every stupid idea that pops into his head.
